description: Base 16 complement of n (write n in base 16, then replace each digit by its base 16 negative).
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..4095 (4095 = 16^3 - 1)
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
prog: (Haskell)a055126 0 = 0a055126 n = if d == 0 then 16 * a055126 n' else 16 * a055126 n' + 16 - d            where (n', d) = divMod n 16-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 12 2014
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Apr 19 2000
